build-type.name: functional_production
build-type.description: runs functional tests on production server

parameters.param: #! /bin/bash export WORKON_HOME=$HOME/.envs export VIRTUALENVWRAPPER_PYTHON=/usr/bin/python3 source /usr/local/bin/virtualenvwrapper.sh workon formalign cp $HOME/settings/settings_production_functional.json ./settings.json export REDIS_URL='redis://localhost:6379/0' python manage.py behave --tags ~@skip --no-skipped --junit --settings=settings_admin
